title: Khirbet Safa
text:
Khirbet Safa () is a <a href="Palestinian%20territories">Palestinian</a> village located twelve kilometers north-west of <a href="Hebron">Hebron</a>.The village is in the <a href="Hebron%20Governorate">Hebron Governorate</a> Southern <a href="West%20Bank">West Bank</a>. According to the <a href="Palestinian%20Central%20Bureau%20of%20Statistics">Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics</a>, the village had a population of 1,105 in mid-year 2006.
History.
In 1883 the <a href="Palestine%20Exploration%20Fund">PEF</a>'s "<a href="PEF%20Survey%20of%20Palestine">Survey of Western Palestine</a>" described it as "a small village, with a <a href="Water%20well">well</a> to the north, on the west slope just below the watershed."
